Posts.EditableText: Hi, welcome to the forum. I tried your game and one thing jumped out at me, since my laptop only has 768 vertical resolution the game screens were mostly too tall. I know that's a short resolution in this day and age but it's something to consider. You might want to check common resolutions and try to adjust the layout accordingly.
